name: In Love
description: You'll protect your beloved! ... what was their name again? This can also be reflavored to be distracted, sympathetic, or aroused.
resist: Roll 1 dice. On a 1-3 you are affected by In Love. On a roll of 4-6, you ignore the effects until next round.
effect: The subject Holds Back (Inflicts half damage) against the foe and the foe's allies.
duration: Until end of scene, or until the source of the status is removed from the battle.
